snippet.title: Alaloth - Champions of The Four Kingdoms - 1.0 Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Baldur's Gate and Dark Souls had a baby! Alaloth is a thrilling RPG game with a huge lore, that blends real-time action with an isometric view, set in a world of magic and monsters. Players must navigate through dangerous dungeons, battle fierce bosses, explore the world, recruit companions, and uncover ancient secrets to save Plamen from an impending doom!

Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/919360/Alaloth_Champions_of_The_Four_Kingdoms/

GOG https://www.gog.com/en/game/alaloth_champions_of_the_four_kingdoms
